title: Gerardo Campos: How a student walkout changed my life
author: Kim Girard
excerpt:
For Latinx Heritage Month we’re featuring members of our Berkeley Haas community. Our first profile is of Gerardo Campos, facilities manager for the Haas faculty and student services buildings. Campos, who is Mexican, discusses early activism that significantly impacted his life. In December 1993, Gerardo Campos helped organize a walkout with hundreds of Latinx students […]
